issue.title: [Integration][JS] Fix map type to allow non-standard field names
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8716](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8716). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Javascript should support the integration test added in ARROW-7173.
